header.note: The source node in most cases contains the sample message as written by the developer. If it looks like a dot-delimitted string such as "form.label.firstname", then the developer has not provided a default message.

trans-unit.target: %classLabel%L'article "%articleTitle%" créé par %articleAuthor% sera publié sur le blog le %articlePublishedAtHours% à %articlePublishedAtMinutes%. N'oublie pas d'aller le regarder dès qu'il sera publié !
trans-unit.note: %articleTitle% is a placeholder %articleAuthor% is a placeholder %articlePublishedAtHours% is a placeholder %articlePublishedAtMinutes% is a placeholder %classLabel% is a placeholder This text contains HTML tags, please try to keep those tags
